Entry.JapaneseText: さっきのトミッチのコト、軍に通報しようヨ。 ほっといたら、被害にあう人が他にも出るヨ。
Entry.EnglishText: We should inform the military about what Tomich did. If we don't, he'll probably victimize someone else.

Entry.JapaneseText: いや……さっきの一件でこりて、 悪事は割に合わないとわかっただろう。
Entry.EnglishText: No... After what happened, you'd think that he'd come to realize that crime doesn't pay.

Entry.JapaneseText: それにも気付かずに、まだ続けるようなら、 いずれ痛い目にあう。世の中は因果応報だ。
Entry.EnglishText: Even if he didn't and tried something like that again, he'll learn his lesson eventually. You reap what you sow.

Entry.JapaneseText: 悪い事をする者には悪い事が、良い事をしていれば 良い事が、報いは必ずあるという事だ。
Entry.EnglishText: It means that misfortune will befall those who commit evil, and good things will come to those who do good.
